revised_title: The Rediscovery and Legacy of Srinivasa Ramanujan
tldr: This article discusses the story of how Srinivasa Ramanujan's reputation as a mathematician grew over time, particularly after the discovery of his "Lost Notebook" in 1976. Ramanujan was a brilliant mathematician who made significant contributions to number theory and made predictions that have yet to be proven. The article also recounts the story of how a bust of Ramanujan was created and presented to the Royal Society.
